entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is reading an obituary about Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts school who has passed away. He is described as kind and willing to help others.

relationships.description: Harry knew Dumbledore, but only superficially. Harry had never imagined what Dumbledore was like in his childhood or youth.
